entries.title_d: We have detected a hyperspace surge near you with the ship signature fitting one of the Inquisitions experimental fighters. It's not alone though so you will need to destroy his escort before capturing him.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Recover experimental fighter.
entries.thanks_2: Ship sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.thanks_1: Ship sensors show area clear of hostile fighter vessels. Continuing flight on planned escape path.
entries.taunt_2: Destroy them! Don't let them get away! You'll pay, rebel scum, you'll pay!
entries.taunt_1: You won't get away with this, rebel!
entries.target_disabled: Vortex Command: < Target has been disabled. You're astromech should be launching the space assault droid now, keep the ship safe while it's doing its work. >
entries.split_quest_alert: Brother Ezkiel: < Good, we have the ship. Our freighter crew is packing up the 'pilot' as we'd like to have an immediate look at him. Stand by. >
entries.recovery_success: That was a close one. Good work, pilot. We should be able to get some useful information off that ship and the Inquisitor inside it.
entries.quest_recover_d: The space assault droid is trying to get control of the ship. Keep it safe in the meantime.
entries.quest_location_d: You're out of the high risk area packed with Imperial presence but in the Dathomir system there's really no where to relax.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the captured fighter to safety. The Empire is close by and will undoubtedly send fighters to prevent you from escaping, so be prepared.
entries.quest_disable_d: Disable the experimental fighter. Keep in mind that its escort will try to eliminate you and if everything else fail, they will try to eliminate fighter itself. You will need to dispatch of them or you will have trouble finishing the mission.
entries.panic_2: Ship sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.panic_1: Ship sensors show incoming fighter vessels with armed weapons systems.
entries.failed_escape: The enemy has hyperspaced out of your immediate area. The mission is a failure, pilot. Report to Ezkiel for further instruction.
entries.failed_destroy: Pilot! The mission is a failure. The target ship was destroyed! Report to Ezkiel for further instruction.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Vortex Command: < Excellent! The escort vessels have been destroyed. >
entries.escort_remaining: Vortex Command: < Nice one, pilot! Only %DI enemy vessels left in the area. >
entries.complete: Unit reached safety point. Moving target vessel to rendez-vous coordinates with allied freighter.
entries.capture_started: Tactical Computer: < Scanning ... ... Capture underway. Stand by. >
entries.capture_phase_2: Unit in place with full control of vessel. Repairing engine system now.
entries.capture_phase_1: Unit has breached vessel. Subduing crew.
entries.capture_complete: Vortex Command: < Excellent, the droid has control of the ship and it's repaired. Provide a safe escort for him pilot. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrival_phase_2: Timing couldn't be more perfect. The target has arrived. Watch out for its escort.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Stay on the alert, pilot. We've located a perfect target for your recovery mission. Our systems detect a hyperspace surge in your area.
entries.angry_disable: Rebel scum! The Imperial Inquisition and our allies will find you and crush your puny army! You haven't heard the last of us!
entries.abort: Receiving abort code. Initiating self destruct sequence.
